Source.Name: openfortivpn
Source.Summary: openfortivpn is a client for PPP+SSL VPN tunnel services.
Source.Description: openfortivpn is a client for PPP+SSL VPN tunnel services. It spawns a pppd process and operates the communication between the gateway and this process. It is compatible with Fortinet VPNs.

Package.Name: openfortivpn
Package.Summary: openfortivpn is a client for PPP+SSL VPN tunnel services.
Package.Description: openfortivpn is a client for PPP+SSL VPN tunnel services. It spawns a pppd process and operates the communication between the gateway and this process. It is compatible with Fortinet VPNs.
